efforts.name: Agent Development Workflow
efforts.description: Establish a process for building agents as a team

projects.name: Team Agent Development Process
projects.description: Establish a standard process for developing agents

tasks.title: ⭐ Define development workflow
tasks.description: Create a standard process for developing agents. Include planning, development, testing, and deployment steps.

tasks.title: Set up agent templates
tasks.description: Create reusable templates for common agent types. Standardize structure and patterns to speed up development.

tasks.title: Establish testing practices
tasks.description: Define testing requirements. Set up test environments and test data. Create testing checklists.

tasks.title: Create deployment process
tasks.description: Define how agents are deployed. Set up staging and production environments. Document deployment steps.

tasks.title: Set up version control
tasks.description: Use version control for agent code. Track changes, enable collaboration, and maintain history.

tasks.title: Document development standards
tasks.description: Create documentation for development standards. Include naming conventions, structure, and best practices.

projects.name: Collaborative Agent Building
projects.description: Build agents together as a team

tasks.title: ⭐ Plan agent together
tasks.description: Gather requirements from team members. Design the agent collaboratively. Ensure everyone understands the goal.

tasks.title: Divide development work
tasks.description: Break agent into components. Assign work based on expertise and learning goals. Ensure clear ownership.

tasks.title: Set up collaboration tools
tasks.description: Use tools for collaboration: shared documents, communication channels, and project tracking.

tasks.title: Code review process
tasks.description: Review each other's code. Share knowledge, ensure quality, and learn from each other.

tasks.title: Deploy and monitor
tasks.description: Deploy the agent together. Monitor performance and gather feedback from users.

tasks.title: Iterate based on feedback
tasks.description: Gather user feedback and improve the agent. Make iterative improvements based on real-world usage.

efforts.name: Agent Best Practices
efforts.description: Learn and apply best practices for building effective agents

tasks.title: ⭐ Understand agent patterns
tasks.description: Learn common agent patterns and when to use them. Study examples and understand best practices.

tasks.title: Design for specific use cases
tasks.description: Design agents focused on specific use cases. Avoid trying to do too much in a single agent.

tasks.title: Plan agent inputs and outputs
tasks.description: Clearly define what inputs agents need and what outputs they produce. Make interfaces clear and consistent.

tasks.title: Consider error handling
tasks.description: Plan how agents handle errors. Design graceful failure modes and clear error messages.

tasks.title: Design for maintainability
tasks.description: Build agents that are easy to understand and modify. Use clear structure and good documentation.

tasks.title: Test design with users
tasks.description: Get feedback on agent design from end users. Ensure design meets actual needs.

projects.name: Agent Quality
projects.description: Ensure agents are reliable and effective

tasks.title: ⭐ Define quality criteria
tasks.description: Establish criteria for agent quality. Define what makes an agent 'good' and how to measure it.

tasks.title: Test thoroughly
tasks.description: Test agents with various inputs and scenarios. Include normal cases, edge cases, and error conditions.

tasks.title: Validate outputs
tasks.description: Verify agent outputs are correct and useful. Check accuracy, completeness, and format.

tasks.title: Monitor performance
tasks.description: Track agent performance metrics. Monitor response times, success rates, and user satisfaction.

tasks.title: Gather user feedback
tasks.description: Collect feedback from agent users. Understand what works well and what needs improvement.

tasks.title: Continuously improve
tasks.description: Regularly review and improve agents. Make iterative enhancements based on usage and feedback.

efforts.name: Agent Deployment
efforts.description: Deploy agents to production and manage them effectively

tasks.title: ⭐ Create deployment checklist
tasks.description: Document deployment steps and pre-deployment checks. Include testing, configuration, and validation steps.

tasks.title: Set up staging environment
tasks.description: Create staging environment matching production. Test deployments in staging before production release.

tasks.title: Configure production settings
tasks.description: Set production configurations: API keys, rate limits, timeouts, and resource allocations.

tasks.title: Prepare rollback plan
tasks.description: Plan how to rollback if deployment fails. Test rollback process to ensure it works.

tasks.title: Notify stakeholders
tasks.description: Communicate deployment plans to stakeholders. Set expectations and provide timelines.

tasks.title: Schedule deployment
tasks.description: Plan deployment timing. Choose low-traffic periods and ensure team availability.

tasks.title: ⭐ Monitor deployment
tasks.description: Closely monitor agent after deployment. Watch for errors, performance issues, and user feedback.

tasks.title: Set up monitoring
tasks.description: Configure monitoring for agent performance, errors, and usage. Set up alerts for critical issues.

tasks.title: Gather initial feedback
tasks.description: Collect feedback from early users. Identify issues and improvements needed.

tasks.title: Document operational procedures
tasks.description: Create runbooks for common operations: deployments, troubleshooting, and maintenance.

tasks.title: Plan for updates
tasks.description: Establish process for updating agents. Plan regular improvements and feature additions.

tasks.title: Review deployment success
tasks.description: Evaluate deployment success. Document lessons learned and improve process for next time.
